this post critically examines the concept of data privacy in the context of social media use. it questions the idea that individuals can still have control over their personal information when they actively participate in online platforms that thrive on collecting and analyzing user data. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy) and #privatsphÃ¤re (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience interested in these topics.
